received.headline: First degree connection
received.text: I hired Sudarshan at Enphase to lead ITK engineering team. Installer Tool Kit is a key mobile application to help installers commission the Enphase system for customers. Sudarshan played a key role in migrating the application to latest tech stack for iOS, Android and backend services and resolve critical customer issues to improve overall customer experience. This helped in significantly improved app rating. Sudarshan is technically sound, hardworking, and extremely good team player. It was a pleasure working with Sudarshan and I wish him all the best for future endeavours.
